00038 int pcf8574_Read( knet_dev_t * dev , 
00039                   unsigned char *value , 
00040                   unsigned char mask )
00041 {
00042   int rc=0;
00043  
00044   if ( value != NULL ) {
00045 
00046     if ((rc=knet_lltransfer( dev , 
00047                              &mask , 1 ,
00048                              value , 1 )) < 0 )
00049       return rc;
00050   }
00051 
00052   return rc;
00053 }
00054 
00055 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00066 int pcf8574_Write( knet_dev_t * dev , unsigned char value )
00067 {
00068   int rc;
00069   
00070   rc=knet_llwrite( dev , &value , 1 );
00071   
00072   return rc;
00073 }
